tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive material properties for structural calculations including strength, modulus, density, and other engineering properties for various construction materials.

material_type.description: Type of material (steel, concrete, timber, aluminum, masonry)

material_grade.description: Specific grade or class of material (e.g., A992, Grade60, fy350)

error_messages: Unknown material type: Use one of [steel, concrete, timber, aluminum, masonry]
Invalid material grade: Provide a recognized grade for the specified material type
Unsupported unit system: Use either 'metric' or 'imperial'
usage: Specify material_type and material_grade, optionally set units. The tool returns all relevant material properties for structural calculations.

yield_strength.description: Yield strength in MPa or psi

ultimate_strength.description: Ultimate tensile strength in MPa or psi

elastic_modulus.description: Modulus of elasticity in GPa or psi

density.description: Material density in kg/m³ or lb/ft³
